This app is as straight forward as it can get. Simple & reliable. Easy to use & understand. Like the Torrent apps of old, this one puts very few limits on how fast you can download. It does, however, have a few functional defects like not being able to remove an inactive Torrent without shutting it down. Sometimes, you also have to erase the entire data storage when it can't connect but these are minor problems when it comes to how much & how fast you can get the job done.

google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your report!  We found a bug in 2.4.1 related to this and fixed it in 2.4.2, which should be live within a few hours of this message.  Vuze Remote should (and will) not start on boot unless you specifically have a local torrent client and its autostart option enabled.

Despite the fact that I have the proper access code for the Vuze remote. Gentlemen, please fix the glitch so I can go back to using this great app. It was absolutely perfect for a while. After your 1st answer to my issues and your request to change my rating I've got to be brutally honest. Nothing has changed.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Please try the latest version, it has been updated for newer Android devices.  If it's working (or if you uninstalled our app), please consider re-rating (or removing the rating) based on your new experience.  Thanks!
